Title: Bleach: Memories in the Rain
Description: ['Kurosaki Ichigo, the temporary Shinigami(Death God) for Kuchiki Rukia, discovers his mother\'s killer as one of the Hollows he has been hunting. He does battle with it in a prideful battle of revenge. This Special is actually a flashback of previous episodes in Bleach. After the ending credits, a short plays showing Shinigami and their Zanpakutos to "Number One" from the Bleach Soundtrack. ', '\n', '\n']
Related: ['Parent story: Bleach', 'Side story: Bleach: Gotei 13 Omake']
